subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Coach Steve Spurrier’s South Carolina football team jumped to No. 3 after Saturday’s thorough beating of Georgia while Florida, which beat longtime powerhouse L.S.U., rose to No. 4.
snippet: Coach Steve Spurrier’s South Carolina football team jumped to No. 3 after Saturday’s thorough beating of Georgia while Florida, which beat longtime powerhouse L.S.U., rose to No. 4.
